name: Neural Overload
desc: You can input up to 4 copies of each Mantra ingredient instead of being limited to 3.

name: Conditioned Runner
desc: You regenerate health faster than normal when sprinting below 75% HP.

name: Collapsed Lung
desc: Block breaking an opponent closes off their ability to Vent for 3s.

name: Reinforced Armor
desc: Incoming PEN is reduced by 40%.

name: Ghost
desc: Dodging a move will briefly make you invisible, ending early if you attack.

name: Dazing Finisher
desc: Flourishing enemies that are charmed by you causes them to not be knocked back and be dazed instead.

name: Ether Overdrive [FLM]
desc: Gain 5% extra PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.

name: Ether Overdrive [ICE]
desc: Gain 5% extra PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.

name: Ether Overdrive [LTN]
desc: Gain 5% extra PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.

name: Ether Overdrive [WND]
desc: Gain 5% extra PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.

name: Ether Overdrive [SDW]
desc: Gain 5% extra PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.

name: Ether Overdrive [MTL]
desc: Gain 5% extra PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.

name: Brick Wall
desc: You refuse. You cannot be knocked off your feet until you are knocked completely unconscious. You are also now knocked down for less time.

name: Not A Scratch
desc: You dont show any signs of damage.

name: Unyielding Frost
desc: Your Chill can proc through block, with blocked Chilling proc lasting 80% of the duration.

name: Phoenix Flames
desc: Any time you would burn to death, you instead rise again with 50% of your health restored. Has a 60 second cooldown.

name: Alloyblood
desc: You dont bleed like others do. Bleed damage is halved. Blood loss is reduced by 75%.

name: The Floor is Lava
desc: Your eruptions leave pools of lava beneath them. Dont fall in.

name: Volcanic Glass
desc: Detonating crystals causes an eruption soon after.

name: Million Ton Piercer
desc: Gain 5% extra PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.

name: Will o Wisp [FLM]
desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

name: Will o Wisp [ICE]
desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

name: Will o Wisp [LTN]
desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

name: Will o Wisp [WND]
desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

name: Will o Wisp [SDW]
desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

name: Will o Wisp [MTL]
desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

name: Reshape and Remold
desc: Succesful procs of Scrapsinger will increase the amount of armor damage your opponent takes. After hitting the cap, the opponent will take +5% damage.

name: A World Without Song
desc: Every 3 hits with a Wind Mantra now procs Suffocate.

name: Possession
desc: After an apparation hits an enemy, recieve 30% posture damage on all Galebreath attacks for 6 seconds. If the apparation hits while you have Phantom Step activated, recieve a 15% chip damage buff as well for the same duration.

name: Dustlunge
desc: You can now assassinate enemies from much farther range, shadestepping to their location if theyre too far. You automatically assassinate other nearby enemies.

name: Another Mans Trash
desc: Take unequipped equipment when mugging a player.

name: Audacity
desc: Once youve brought down your prey. instill fear into all those who would seperate you from claiming it. Grants nearby allies a 5% damage buff for 10s. 40s cooldown.

name: Command: Live
desc: Once per hour, command a servant to defy all odds and obey your command - live.

name: Phantom Edge
desc: Your weapon M1s have +0.25 range.

name: An Ironsingers Instinct
desc: Successfully dodging an attack coats you in metal and reduces the damage of the next attack damage taken. 18s CD.

name: Perfect Flash
desc: Having over 95% health causes your mantras to do +25% more damage. This damage bonus will scale down to 10% if your enemies are far away.

name: Everchanging Aegis
desc: You take 20% less damage from attacks the same element as the last element you were hit with, but 10% more damage from attacks from different elements.

name: Overflowing Dam
desc: Having full Ether for 1.5 seconds or more grants an aura to your attacks that grants them 15% more damage.

name: Wyverns Claw [HVY]
desc: You deal 10% more damage while airborne.

name: Wyverns Claw [LHT]
desc: You deal 10% more damage while airborne.

name: Wyverns Claw [MED]
desc: You deal 10% more damage while airborne.

name: Aerogliding
desc: When falling from a high place, hold spacebar to generate wind currents until you hit the floor. Also gives you more airtime with Gliders.

name: Stifled Jump
desc: Enemies who jump while suffocated by you are dazed.

name: Potion Quaffer [FTD]
desc: Youre accustomed to drinking toxic fluids quickly. Youll get along famously with the other patrons at the tavern. Drinking potions slows you down less.

name: Potion Quaffer [WIL]
desc: Youre accustomed to drinking toxic fluids quickly. Youll get along famously with the other patrons at the tavern. Drinking potions slows you down less.

name: Placebo Effect
desc: Drinking potions near allies will share the potions effect with them.

name: Carnivore
desc: In return for losing the ability to eat vegetation, sate your hunger by gripping monsters and people alike.

name: Heavy Fatigue
desc: [Greataxe] Hitting an enemy slowed by your Greataxe temporarily reduces how far they can roll.

name: Rending Impact
desc: [Greataxe] Block breaking an enemy applies an extended knockdown.

name: Evasive Expert
desc: Your speed boost granted from dodging is increased.

name: Risky Moves
desc: When you successfully dodge, youll automatically dodge the next attack.

name: Champions Regalia
desc: Flourishing an opponent grants you 1.5x posture damage for 10 seconds.

name: Defiance
desc: Negative status effects are half as effective when you are below 35% HP.

name: Destructive Recovery
desc: [Greatsword] Enemies recover an additional 50% less when parrying.

name: Unstoppable Force
desc: [Greathammer] You take 25% less posture damage when parried.

name: Lords Tithe
desc: Everyone you Reinforce is drained of their Ether for 20s.

name: Grand Support
desc: Everyone you buff with Reinforce is healed slightly. Youre healed slightly if you heal others.

name: Knifes Journey
desc: Cancelling an enemys Mantra windup with your basic attack now deals 15% more damage.

name: Preceding Chill
desc: Enemies hit during the last moments of your ice beam are frozen.

name: Dark Rift
desc: Enter a rifted state when you sucessfully dodge, where you cant be damaged until its duration ends. Can be cancelled early if you attack.

name: Tap Dancer
desc: Rolling immediately after a roll-cancel no longer puts your roll on a longer cooldown.

name: Spine Cutter
desc: Hitting an enemy in the back after a roll cancel will initiate a second slash that deals your weapons raw damage.

name: Concussion
desc: Enemies you flourish into walls have their vision altered for a short duration and are dazed longer than usual.

name: Strong Stern
desc: The duration you are dazed from wall bangs is cut in half.

name: Eureka
desc: Receive Ether back on every successful perfect cast.

name: Fishman
desc: You can execute enemies in water. Gain additional healing from knocking others in water.

name: The Final Act
desc: Landing a fire mantra immediately after flourishing an opponent will cause them to explode.

name: Graceful Steps
desc: Your dancing steps now gives a faster speed boost.

name: Warding Radiance
desc: Every fire mantra builds up one halo stack. At 3 stacks a halo appears that allows you to slide further. Hells Partisan is also triggered passively while this is active.

name: Exoskeleton
desc: You have a layer of fortified Natural Armor that replenishes when you rest. Your Natural Armor will resist 10% of Physical Damage while active.

name: To The Finish
desc: You take 10% less damage when below 30% health.

name: Frozen Legs
desc: Your slow effect prevents opponents from rolling.

name: Neuroplasticity [INT]
desc: Your mind is a pliable, flexible substance. The Ether cost of additional modifications to your Mantra is now reduced by 20%.

name: Neuroplasticity [FTD]
desc: Your mind is a pliable, flexible substance. The Ether cost of additional modifications to your Mantra is now reduced by 20%.

name: Neuroplasticity [CHR]
desc: Your mind is a pliable, flexible substance. The Ether cost of additional modifications to your Mantra is now reduced by 20%.

name: Armor Piercing [LHT]
desc: Your gun attacks now ignore 20% of an opponents physical armor. Applied multiplicatively before PEN is applied.

name: Armor Piercing [MED]
desc: Your rifle attacks now ignore 20% of an opponents physical armor. Applied multiplicatively before PEN is applied.

name: True Ether Bullets [LHT]
desc: Using Ether Bullets applies elemental damage of your highest investment.

name: True Ether Bullets [MED]
desc: Using Ether Bullets applies elemental damage of your highest investment.

name: All the Dead Gods
desc: Your M1s now apply anti-heal for 8s.

name: Peripheral Vision
desc: Your glare now ignores if your opponent is facing you.

name: Frozen Pin-Cushion
desc: Hitting an opponent with your Ice Daggers causes them to freeze.

name: Saint Jay
desc: When a Chilled enemy receives a heal, its nullified and 60% of the healing is redirected to you. While this is active and they are on ice your rate of healing is increased.

name: Grand Skewer
desc: Press [F] during the windup of Grand Javelin to activate. Your Grand Javelin now carries opponents through the air.,

name: Observation
desc: Dodge frames are larger if you cancel your roll immediately.

name: Safety Dance
desc: Your base dodge frames are increased by 0.05s.

name: Piercing Will
desc: When your sanity is at stake gain +15% PEN on your attacks.

name: Lose Your Mind
desc: Deal more damage the more insane you are. Grants 15% damage at maximum insanity.

name: Thresher Claws
desc: All of your attacks have +5% more PEN. Your M1s and critical attacks have an additional 5% PEN on top.

name: Warriors Respite
desc: Stop moving for 15 seconds in order to initiate healing.

name: Lootskipper
desc: Mobs have a much higher chance to drop their rarest loot when slain.

name: Return to the Dark Ages
desc: Your mantra damage is cut by 20%, but your incoming mantra damage is cut by 20% too.

name: Impervious Slumber
desc: Getting hit while knocked no longer resets your time knocked.

name: Fists of Fortitude
desc: Every 6 Light Hits builds of a Shield of Endurance reducing incoming damage by 15%.

name: Lightspeed Reflexes
desc: Feinting gives a brief auto-parry window.

name: All Knowing
desc: Your prediction now ignores the range requirement to reflect attacks.

name: Bulldozer
desc: Enemies you flourish into walls have a chance of breaking the wall and are guard broken on impact.

name: Rending Needle: Impaler
desc: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull instead pulls out all of the rod for damage.

name: Rending Needle: Jailer
desc: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull will restrain them instead of pulling them.

name: Rending Needle: Conductor
desc: 5 metal rods will combine into a conductor rod. If an enemy uses a non-Ironsing elemental mantra, theyre dealt their element back in turn.

name: Dirty Boxing
desc: Enemies hit after you feint them with your fist suffer slight bleed and have their vision obscured slightly. 5s cooldown.

name: Masterwork
desc: Succesfull hits from Artisan Blades will proc metal rods and deal slightly more damage.

name: Shadow Travel
desc: Teleport to a location in exchange for Ether cost. Certain ranges will require a health sacrifice. Be careful as this technique can prove lethal to the user.

name: Silencers Blade
desc: Meleeing a Suffocated opponent will extend the duration of the Suffocation and grant a speed boost.

name: Golden Tongue
desc: Typing gives a random buff to you and those around you. (60 second cooldown)

name: Bloodiron Spirit
desc: You regain some Armor upon killing enemies.

name: Vanishing Wraith
desc: Your Aerial Attacks while in Phantom Step will now teleport you behind your target.

name: Punishing Blow
desc: Daze swinging opponents when hitting them with an M1 with a heavy weapon.

name: Mirage Clone
desc: Successfully dodging leaves a heat mirage clone that sets enemies that swung at you on fire.

name: Static Fakeout
desc: Roll cancelling immediately after a parry will cause you to teleport behind your opponent.

name: Cheap Shot
desc: Your attacks gain 10% PEN when you have an active speedboost.

name: Burning Sacrifice
desc: Sacrifice puppets who have been alive for half of their lifetime and burn purple for Flame Emperor Stacks.

name: Rule Through Fear
desc: Executing an enemy applies Overcharm to nearby allies and yourself.

name: Denial Repulse
desc: You now emit a delayed burst of flames after coming close to death.

name: Undying Flame
desc: Your flame can be casted in the depths. Standing close to your graceful flame will slowly restore sanity for others in the area.

name: Speed Demon
desc: Your attacks now inflict bleed while you have a speed boost. 1s cooldown.

name: Air Counter
desc: You can now "Aerial Attack" to catch enemies who have recently jumped in the air above you as an anti-air attack with reduced Light Attack damage. Upon hitting the opponent briefly hinder them.

name: Encore
desc: Your Sing now stun opponents who are already charmed.

name: Command: Sacrifice
desc: Sacrifice the health of a servant in order to restore your own.

name: Command: Return
desc: Command your servant to obey your vow and return to your side.

name: Chronostasis
desc: Landing an M1 or Critical Strike now puts target resonance on cooldown for a short duration.

name: Scuba Drowner
desc: You wont always drown to death when downed in water.

name: Showstopper
desc: When an enemy would roll through one of your physical attacks, stomp the ground, dazing anyone nearby. Removes speed buffs from target upon landing.

name: Time To Go
desc: Taking a life grants a speed boost for 10 seconds. Taking a players life doubles the speed boost and the duration.

name: Kick Off
desc: You easily brush off shorter falls, taking no damage. Your first wall jump will always send you higher than normal. Gain a speed boost after wall jumping over a wall.

name: Steady Footing
desc: Youre much more resistant to being pushed around. You dont slide on ice.

name: Exposed Durability
desc: Deal +10% damage to opponents with no armor durability left.

name: Gale Coil
desc: Your suffocates last twice as long.

name: Aeronade
desc: Your trap automatically detonates on contact with an object.

name: Suffocating Impact
desc: When flourishing enemies into walls they are suffocated and winded for a short duration.

name: Gale Trap
desc: Knocking a player tags them with a wind trap, cause anyone to pick up that body to get sent flying. However, if you pick up the body you gain the speed boost for 20 seconds.

name: Vacuum Punch
desc: Your Gale Punch pulls enemies in before you hit them.

name: Apothecary
desc: Potions you prepare will have amplified positive effects when consumed, and amplified negative effects when thrown.

name: Wild Alchemy
desc: You have a chance to brew 2 potions instead of 1.

name: Chain Reaction
desc: When applying a potion effect to someone who already has one, the new effect is amplified. You have a 25% chance not to deplete potions when drinking them.

name: Chemists Bag
desc: You no longer drop Potions on death.

name: Approaching Singularity
desc: You now gain +1% Mantra PEN for every 10 points of Intelligence.

name: Scaredy Cat
desc: When enemies initiate a fight with you, gain a speed boost.

name: Endurance Runner
desc: Even when things look dire, you still have it in you to keep your legs moving.

name: Last Laugh
desc: Gain the ability to incinerate yourself when down with Flame Within. If Phoenix Flames procs, you will only be restored up to 25% of your HP instead of the full 50%.

name: Flame Within
desc: An application of Pleekstys concept of the inner flame, also known as the soul of man. Set yourself ablaze to gain 5% extra damage and 10% extra speed.

name: Hook, Line, and Sinker
desc: Once somethings caught your line, its much harder to get loose.

name: Fishers Lure
desc: Fish are drawn to your line more quickly.

name: Proficient Baiting
desc: Casting your line excites ocean life, reducing the chances of fishing up trash.

name: Grand Feast
desc: Regain ether, tempo, blood, and health from killing.

name: Sunken Predator
desc: Enemies you hit in the water or the depths have their speed buffs nullified and are slowed.

name: Master Craftsman
desc: Your skills alone substitute the need for a Craft Station.

name: Lowstride
desc: When crouching, your stealth and roll distance are increased. The speed penalty you receive from crouching is much smaller. You now draw and sheathe your weapon silently.

name: Lights Out
desc: Assassinations now give you 30% PEN and blind the target for 5s. Those you carry are now blindfolded.

name: Deep Wound
desc: Assassinating a target applies anti-heal for 20s and gives you a speed boost for 3s. Assassination damage now scales with level against mobs.

name: Unseen Threat
desc: You can assassinate those with weapons out provided youre not in combat yourself. Those you assassinate are slowed and unable to jump for 5s.

name: Triathlete
desc: You swim faster in water.

name: Pitcher
desc: You can throw things further.

name: First Interrogation
desc: Attacks from opponents who are Electrified will give you Ether proportional to their initial damage.

name: Resolve Crusher
desc: Lightning moves now apply stacks of Resolve Crusher. At 4 stacks, you apply Electrified to your opponent. Attacks from Electrified opponents are converted into Lightning damage, but will deal 10% less damage to you.

name: Second Interrogation
desc: Opponents who are electrified do 50% less damage to you.

name: Authority Intimidation
desc: All moves that apply electricity slow the opponent more.

name: Moving Fortress
desc: Blocking no longer slows you down as much.

name: Battle Tendency
desc: You can breathe more easily with +20% faster posture regen.

name: Firmly Planted
desc: All slow debuffs towards you are reduced by 30%.

name: Perseverance
desc: When youre knocked down, you get back up again more quickly.

name: Braced Collapse
desc: After being block broken, the next attack to hit you deals reduced damage.

name: Giantslayer
desc: Deal more damage to larger foes.

name: Berserk
desc: One with nothing to lose has everything to gain. Succumb to the burning rage within, nullifying your own armor in exchange for nullifying the armor of your foes on your M1s. Grants your Criticals +10% PEN while active.

name: Bruisers Mixup
desc: Switching your fight Style mid-fight makes your basic Fist attack inflict bleed temporarily.

name: Brazen Blow
desc: [Greataxe] Attacking an enemy slowed by your Greataxe grants you temporary hyperarmor. 20s CD.

name: Impairing Blow
desc: [Greataxe] Basic attacks will slightly slow your enemy for 2s. Running attacks will slightly slow for 3s. Gain +20% posture damage against enemies with speed boosts

name: Swift Rebound
desc: Move faster after successfully dodging an attack.

name: Underdog
desc: You deal 3% more damage to those with higher HP than you.

name: Charismatic Cast
desc: Landing a hit with a mantra on an enemy causes them to be charmed by your moves, reducing their damage done to you.

name: Morale Booster
desc: Allies recover from being knocked twice as quickly when charmed by you.

name: Tough Love
desc: Deal 10% more damage to enemies charmed by you. Being hit by someone the same race or oath as you charms them briefly.

name: Chaotic Charm
desc: Charm enemies nearby when attacked at low health. Enemies affected by this charm have their damage increased to anyone but you, and deal reduce damage towards you.

name: Lasting Charisma
desc: Enemies charmed by your mantras are charmed longer.

name: Freezing Wight
desc: Your Haunted Gale now procs Chilled.

name: Heavy Hitter
desc: [Heavy Weapons] Your M1 posture damage is increased by 25%.

name: Harsh Response
desc: Enemies receive less posture back when parrying your attacks.

name: Pressure Detonation
desc: Block breaking an opponent with a Shadow mantra generates a small vacuum that suffocates those hit.

name: Decisive Blow
desc: Hitting an enemy with your Critical Attack immediately after they dodge now pros Knifes Journey. Your Knifes Journey procs do 2x Armor damage.

name: Spike Traps
desc: Press [F] during the wind up of your Ice Spikes to create traps around you instead of spawning a spike in the normal spot.

name: Cool Head
desc: If set on fire while on ice, immediately put it out and gain the Cool Head status for 30s. During Cool Head, you cannot be lit on fire. 15s cooldown.

name: Condensation Drip
desc: Passively collect condensation from the air, greatly reducing your thirst.

name: Fragile Freeze
desc: Your Ice mantras will freeze opponents upon blockbreaking them.

name: Chilling Flourish
desc: When flourishing an enemy, they leave behind a trail of ice in the direction you send them.

name: Cryostasis
desc: When block broken, freeze yourself, negating the damage of the net attack.

name: Rude Awakening
desc: When in Cryostasis inflict frost damage to the enemy who hit you.

name: Muffled Screams
desc: You quieten the cries of help of those you execute, reducing the distance at which their allies will hear it and come to assist, and reduce the effectiveness of talents that slow your execution.

name: In a Hurry
desc: Grip players faster whenever you have a speed boost active.

name: Blood Thirsty
desc: Gain a speed boost after causing an opponent heavy blood loss.

name: Assassin
desc: Assassination damage now scales with level. Assassination now gives you a temporary speed boost.

name: Dark God
desc: If a Shadowcast mantra would drain your opponents Ether to 0, drain from their Tempo instead and increase your Tempo. Shadowcast mantras will now raise your tempo if your ether is full.

name: Dark Synergy
desc: Engulf your enemy in shadows when flourishing them.

name: Shadow Overflow
desc: Extra ether stolen with mantras are exerted as dark energy, damaging and absorbing ether from those nearby.

name: Dark Hours
desc: Your Shadowcast Mantras deal more damage at night.

name: Dark Replenishment
desc: Knocking out an enemy in combat restores a portion of your ether.

name: Overwhelming Drain
desc: If multiple enemies are hit by your Shadow Eruption, they are dazed.

name: Blackhole
desc: Your singularity pulls everyone nearby in.

name: Energy Siphon
desc: Your singularity now pulls ether from the extra players affected by Blackhole.

name: Spell Shout
desc: You now will shout the names of your mantras upon cast.
needs: QUEST: Pay 50 Notes to the Spell Shout NPC in Isle of Vigils

name: Depths Connection
desc: Your interaction with The Depths allows you to easily draw ether from the surrounding air.

name: The Sound from Below
desc: You can hear it pounding in your head. The sound that comes from beneath the waves. Will you respond?

name: Frozen Web
desc: Landing a critical with a Static link on your opponent applies Chilled.

name: Duelists Dance
desc: Parrying an opponent gives you 25% more posture back.

name: Steady Nerves
desc: You dance from toe to toe - successful dodges restore posture.

name: Concussive Force
desc: Enemies you knocked remain down longer than usual.

name: Precise Swing
desc: After landing a critical your next light attack with have +5% chip damage.

name: Strong Hold
desc: [Medium Weapons] When above half health and two-handling, posture damage taken is reduced by 20%.

name: Concussive Flash
desc: Your blinding light now concusses foes.

name: Give and Take
desc: Deal less damage to comrades and receive less damage from comrades

name: Off Your Game
desc: You now slow Taunted enemies when you hit them.

name: Cornered Fool
desc: Blockbreaking a Charmed opponent procs Taunt for 5s, making them take and deal more damage. 15s CD.

name: Robber Baron
desc: You hold onto more of your items when defeated.

name: Ether Blade
desc: You gain ether when you parry Mantras.

name: Mantra Permanence
desc: Knocking an enemy with a mantra refunds the cost of the mantra.

name: Nullifying Clarity
desc: Deal 10% more damage to enemies with status effects on them with your basic attacks but the effect is removed on impact.

name: Ether Absorption
desc: Receive Ether back when inflicted with damage from Mantras.

name: Ether Conduit
desc: Your Ether adept talents that grant you Ether on proc now give you stacks of Inspiration. At 3 stacks of Inspiration, your mantras will deal 10% more damage for 3s.

name: Magical Resolve
desc: Being hit increases Ether regen for a short duration.

name: Charged Return
desc: Being under an elemental status effect causes your M1s and critical attacks to do 20% more damage.

name: Phoenix Impact
desc: If you Meteor Slam an opponent while youre on Fire, restore some HP and Ether.

name: Meteor Impact
desc: Aerial moves will follow up into a devastating slam.

name: Dancing Steps
desc: Fire mantras now move you in the direction youre facing.

name: Flamewalker
desc: When Warding Radiance is active you leave trails of flame when you slide.

name: Cauterized Wounds
desc: Blood loss from all sources is lowered.

name: Hells Partisan
desc: After landing a flame dagger on an opponent, your next hit against them will impale with a divine spear from above.

name: Flamecharm Unbounded
desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your flamecharm to its fullest.

name: Wildfire
desc: Pressing [F] before releasing your Flame Impact will release a wider but shorter flame.

name: Azure Flames
desc: Many of your flames turn blue, signifying their increased intensity.

name: Unyielding Inferno
desc: Your flames burn just as strong even in the fiercest of storms.

name: Flamecharmer
desc: Grants you the ability to command Fire as a Flamecharmer.

name: Adept Flamecharmer
desc: You can now obtain 1-star Flamecharmer Mantras.

name: Expert Flamecharmer
desc: You can now obtain 2-star Flamecharmer Mantras.

name: Master Flamecharmer
desc: You can now obtain 3-star Flamecharmer mantras.

name: Produce Spark
desc: A simple production of flame for the use of making campfires.

name: Temperature Shock
desc: Your fire mantras now detonate any stacked crystals.

name: Glacial Mobility
desc: Cast Ice Blade while slide-jumping to perform a special running attack.

name: Glacial Finish
desc: Press [F] while using your Ice Smash Mantra to follow up with a devastating attack.

name: Frostdraw Unbounded
desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your frostdraw to its fullest.

name: Master Frostdrawer
desc: You can now obtain 3-star Frostdrawer mantras.

name: Glacial Ice
desc: Your frost is now considerably more intense.

name: Frostdrawer
desc: Grants you the ability to command Ice as a Frostdrawer.

name: Adept Frostdrawer
desc: You can now obtain 1-star Frostdrawer mantras.

name: Expert Frostdrawer
desc: You can now obtain 2-star Frostdrawer mantras.

name: Cold Front
desc: Your Vent is imbued with glacial frost.

name: Orbital Ice
desc: When landing a parry while standing on ice, automatically form a ring of ice that grants 15% Physical Resistance. The ring will break after sustaining a certain amount of damage, scaling with your Frostdraw.

name: Glacial Coasting
desc: Sliding while Orbital Ice is active leaves trails of ice.

name: Tempest Wind
desc: Cast Wind Blade while sliding to unleash a quick whirlwind attack.

name: Galebreathe Unbounded
desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your galebreathe to its fullest.

name: Master Galebreather
desc: You can now obtain 3-star Galebreather mantras.

name: Galebreather
desc: Grants you the ability to command Wind as a Galebreather

name: Adept Galebreather
desc: You can now obtain 1-star Galebreather mantras.

name: Expert Galebreather
desc: You can now obtain 2-star Galebreather mantras.

name: Inhale
desc: Cancelling a wind spell stores its power in your lungs for 5 seconds, empowering the next wind spell cast in that time. All relevant modifications and upgrades from the inhaled wind mantra are applied to the empowered mantra.

name: After Cut
desc: If an attack is physical and wind it will apply an after cut that does 10% of the damage you dealt. If the attack was a mantra, it does 5% damage instead.

name: Breathing Impact
desc: Knocking enemies into objects with wind spells deals additional blunt damage based on how hard theyre hit.

name: Glass Path: Crystallization
desc: Your Ice abilities no longer grant a slow effect or the ability to freeze and instead cause ice crystals to grow on your opponent.

name: Crystal Shrapnel
desc: Your Crystal explosions now have an AoE that applies crystals to all hit.

name: Reclaimed Glass
desc: Your crystal shrapnel explosions now grant you and any allies caught in them for 10% Elemental Resistance for 10s.

name: Fortitude Unbounded
desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your fortitude to its fullest.
needs: QUEST: Talk to Brutus in Fort Merit

name: Quickdraw
desc: Allows you to fire your offhand gun right after swinging. [Not necessary on dual guns]

name: Bulletproof [FRT]
desc: You take no armor damage from guns.

name: Bulletproof [MED]
desc: You take no armor damage from guns.

name: Bulletproof [LHT]
desc: You take no armor damage from guns.

name: Hammerfall
desc: [Clubs] Aerial attacks do 25% more posture damage when blocked.

name: Brain Rattler
desc: [Clubs] Guardbreaking an opponent with your Critical rattles their brain in its container, causing increased blood loss and blurring their vision.

name: Dispatch
desc: [Clubs] Bear Trapped targets deal 20% less posture. Dazed targets deal 20% less posture. This can stack.

name: Fan the Flames
desc: Your stored Wind mantras can now empower your Fire mantras.

name: Bottom Freeze
desc: Hitting chilled enemies with ice projectiles while they are on ice freezes them to the ground.

name: Frostbite
desc: Enemies can no longer heal when under the effect of your chill.

name: Cryonis
desc: All ice spells casted on top of ice cost less Ether.

name: Frost Buster
desc: Greatsword and Greathammer criticals now place Ice underneath the path they carve.

name: Agitating Spark
desc: Setting enemies on fire spreads to anyone nearby. Including yourself.

name: Immolation
desc: Fire spells cost 70% less while on fire. If you hit someone while on fire, apply fire damage. You take 50% less damage from self-inflicted flames.

name: Corpse Explosion
desc: Bodies that you burn to death immediately explode dealing massive damage.

name: All-Consuming Flame
desc: Your flames will incinerate unconscious Targets much faster.

name: Pleekstys Faith
desc: When on fire, automatically quench flames at the cost of some ether.

name: Willpower Unbounded
desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your willpower to its fullest.
needs: QUEST: Speak to Akira in Castle Light

name: Ironsing Unbounded
desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your ironsing to its fullest.

name: Master Ironsinger
desc: You can now obtain 3-star Ironsinger mantras.

name: Piercing Metal
desc: Deal additional armor damage to enemies per metal rod affecting them

name: Ironsinger
desc: Grants you the ability to command Metal as an Ironsinger. Press X to pull on Metal Rods.

name: Adept Ironsinger
desc: You can now obtain 1-star Ironsinger mantras.

name: Expert Ironsinger
desc: You can now obtain 2-star Ironsinger mantras.

name: Laced Traps
desc: People hit by your Caltrops cannot jump and are slowed for a small duration.

name: Thornmail
desc: Getting flourished applies a metal rod to the attacker.

name: Metal Shackles
desc: Guardbreaking an opponent prevents them from receiving speed boosts for 5 seconds.

name: Heavy Shoulders
desc: If your opponent has 3 or more rods, their dodges are slower.

name: Oh The Irony
desc: Opponents affected by Taunt receive double iron rods for the duration.

name: Ironclad Punishment
desc: Your Ironsing mantras deal more posture damage to enemies the more armor durability they have.

name: Flying Swiftkick
desc: Hitting a Jus Karita critical attack while Swiftkick Prodigy is active will greatly slow your enemy and consume your speed boost.

name: Swiftkick Prodigy
desc: Hitting successive basic attacks with Jus Karita will give you a temporary speed buff.

name: Justicars Prowess
desc: Jus Karita +30% posture damage against other fist styles.

name: Justicars Renewal
desc: Hitting an opponent with your Jus Karita critical resets the cooldown. (10s cooldown)

name: Kickstart [CHA]
desc: Play the resurrector. Use your lightning to defibrillate your allies on the battlefield.

name: Kickstart [FTD]
desc: Play the resurrector. Use your lightning to defibrillate your allies on the battlefield.

name: Blades Edge
desc: [Spears] Damage dealt with the tip of the spear is increased by 10%.

name: Lancers Impale
desc: [Spears] Hitting an enemy after a perfect dodge makes your next attack deal bleed damage. if that attack would already bleed, it adds +10% chip damage instead.

name: Defensive Sweep
desc: [Spears] Posture breaking an opponent grants you +50% Penetration for 3 seconds.

name: Driving Impact
desc: [Spears] The first hit of your Spears Critical Attack will deal the posture damage of the second hit as well. The second hit no longer deals posture damage.

name: Eruption Path: Lava Serpent
desc: Your fire abilities no longer proc burn and instead proc on eruption under the enemies feet.

name: Flash Point
desc: Block-breaking an enemy with a fire mantra applies Burning.

name: Empowered Eruption
desc: Your next Eruption after landing a critical is empowered with increased range and damage. 10s cooldown.

name: Molten Defence
desc: Upon being guard broken, you erupt. 30s cooldown.

name: Scorched Earth
desc: Posture breaking an opponent causes your Eruptions to be Empowered for the next 10s. 45s CD

name: Callout
desc: You can mark objects or enemies by pressing Z, which will mark them for all nearby allies.

name: Spotter
desc: Marking enemies while in Rhythm will indicate their health status to your allies.

name: Air Pressure
desc: Dodging an attack or hitting an enemys block will transform your next dash into a Gale Dash.

name: Hoplite
desc: Posture damage is reduced by 30% when wielding a spear and standing still.

name: Cyclone Blade
desc: After a successful Gale Dash you wrap your finger in wind essence causing your next Light attack to do bleed damage, and adding +10% chip damage.

name: Wind Step
desc: Create a step of wind below you when jumping in the air. Jumping while sliding down a slope or off a cliff launches you forwards.

name: Pressure Break [STR]
desc: Breaking an enemys posture will cause them take intense wind pressure damage and be flung backwards.

name: Pressure Break [AGL]
desc: Breaking an enemys posture will cause them take intense wind pressure damage and be flung backwards.

name: Savior
desc: After saving a player from being gripped gain a short speed boost for a short duration.

name: Scorched Peak
desc: Blockbreaking an enemy on fire or with a fire mantra causes them to be struck by lightning.

name: The Eleventh Hour
desc: When below 15% health your mantras require no ether to cast for 3 seconds. (30 second cooldown)

name: Last Resort
desc: Deal +10% more damage when your health is significantly low.

name: Comeback Kid
desc: When waking up from being knocked you are unable to be knocked down for 5 seconds. (120 second cooldown)

name: Defiant until the End
desc: Slow the enemy trying to execute you down with one last shout of your determination

name: Uproar
desc: When hit 3 or more times within 3 seconds go into an uproar where you cannot be stunned for a short duration.

name: Bloodletter
desc: Hitting opponents on the ground lowers their blood.

name: Aggressive Posture
desc: Hitting your opponent with a basic attack causes them to slow down while walking backwards.

name: Old Habits Die Hard
desc: A blocked attack after a failed parry will cause the attack to deal half posture.

name: Survival Kit [CHA]
desc: You keep a well-stocked set of tools on your person at all times. Your flint never runs out of uses.

name: Survival Kit [WIL]
desc: You keep a well-stocked set of tools on your person at all times. Your flint never runs out of uses.

name: Survival Kit [INT]
desc: You keep a well-stocked set of tools on your person at all times. Your flint never runs out of uses.

name: Conquer your Fears
desc: Killing the beings of the deep replenishes your Sanity somewhat. When an ally grips an enemy nearby to you, you regain Sanity.

name: Breathing Exercise
desc: Your sanity recovers more quickly once out of terrifying situations.

name: Disbelief
desc: Youre resistant to the effects of Illusion magic. You are resistant to charms and tricks.

name: Metal Eater
desc: When you have no Ether, consume armor durability to cast your Ironsing mantras.

name: Intuitive Repair
desc: Your "Iron Skin" repairs armor while its active.

name: Polished Armor
desc: You recieve 10% less damage when your Armor protects you from an attack and has over 90% durability.

name: Metal Absorption
desc: Your Iron Hug also absorbs armor from the enemy.

name: Metal Thief
desc: Pulling an opponent absorbs a portion of their current Armor durability.

name: Shared Misery
desc: Using a M1/Critical Attack on an enemy while losing sanity causes them to lose sanity.

name: Pleekstys Will
desc: You gain some Ether from consuming elemental ingredients.

name: Polite Awakening
desc: Recover 15% of your max health after getting up from being downed. (Only Procs when below 20% HP)

name: Berserker
desc: Knocking an enemy grants you 20% damage resistance for 15 seconds.

name: Gourmand
desc: Your hunger and thirst gain from eating increased.

name: Blinded
desc: Your vision is obscured by something. Somehow, you feel safer. You remember the warmth of your youth.

name: Lightweight
desc: Move faster when your armor runs out of durability.

name: Heavy Haul
desc: Enemies who carry you move significantly slower.

name: Ready or Not
desc: The first attack to hit you while out of combat has its damage cut in half.

name: Anxious Guard
desc: Hitting an enemies block causes their parry window to be lowered for 5s. 15s CD

name: Full Reset
desc: Knocking an enemy resets your resonance cooldowns. This effect has a 60 second cooldown.

name: Replenishing Knockout
desc: Gain more health and posture from downing enemies.

name: Armor Conserver
desc: You lose 15% less armor when hit.

name: Speed Emission
desc: Gain a slight speed boost after landing a vent.

name: Blighted Song
desc: Attaching your Shadow Chains to enemies disables both your and your enemys ability to cast mantras. You take reduced damage from non-chained enemies while this is applied.

name: Martyr
desc: Enemies gain less health and posture when knocking you.

name: Pack Mule
desc: The max quantity for food you can hold is increased by 5.

name: Elegy of Light
desc: The Unspoken Vow of the Waking God resonates through you, if briefly. Protects you from the effects of Deep Gems for 3 minutes. Remains dormant until you take the life of an equal.

name: Boulder Climb
desc: Your climb height increases when you slide jump.

name: Charisma Unbounded
desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your charisma to its fullest.

name: Ardour Scream
desc: Amplify your shout into a scream using Ardour, dominating weaker foes. (Hold H and release)

name: Padded Armor
desc: While your armor is broken (or if you have no armor), you take 5% less damage.

name: Steel Scales
desc: You take an additional 5% less damage when your armor is broken.

name: Captain Etrea
desc: Moving while with a shield no longer slows you down.

name: Duelists Lunge
desc: [Rapier] Running M1s deal increased posture damage. Upon landing your critical, your next running M1 has increased range.

name: Pressure Skewer
desc: [Rapier] Flourishing an enemy causes your M1s to deal additional blood loss until you take damage.

name: Frenzied Dance
desc: [Rapier] When your posture is about to collapse, you deal greater chip and posture damage.

name: Fast Blade
desc: Increase the speed boost you get from successfully parrying an attack.

name: Twelve Steps Ahead
desc: Landing Prediction will halve the cooldown to a minimum of 2s. Whiffing will double the cooldown to a maximum of 30s. This effect stacks up for up to 30 seconds.

name: Successive Prediction
desc: Predicting an attack will briefly allow you to predict another.

name: Intelligence Unbounded
desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your intelligence to its fullest.

name: Strength Unbounded
desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your strength to its fullest.

name: Rapid Reload
desc: [1H Guns] You have 20% faster reload when reloading an empty pistol.

name: Lock n Load
desc: [1H Guns] The first bullet in your gun does more damage when fully loaded. This damage buff scales with the number of bullets up to 15%.

name: Sleight of Hand
desc: [1H Guns] When you flourish an opponent, you instantly load a bullet.

name: Rapid Fire
desc: [Pistols] When you land a critical shot gain the ability to rapidly fire your critical for 2s. 12s cooldown.

name: Ultrakill
desc: [1H Guns] When under the effects of Rapid Fire you reload 2x as fast. (Play Ultrakill)

name: One in the Chamber
desc: [1H Guns] After fully reloading, the last bullet in your gun will do more damage. This damage buff scales with the number of bullets up to 20%.

name: Pardon Me
desc: Crimes you commit in allied territories are often ignored. Whos asking?

name: Cult of Personality
desc: You gain +3% PEN per each person Charmed. Capping at +15% PEN.

name: Bodyguard Detail
desc: If youre attacked in allied territory, your allies will come rushing to your aid. Earpiece transceiver not included.

name: Celebrity
desc: Your natural skill in mediating conflict makes people think more highly of you. Your base reputation with factions is higher and your reputation caps out higher.

name: Under The Radar
desc: The negative reputation threshold for a faction to put up on bounty posters is now higher.

name: Hungry Flames
desc: When you have no Ether, consume Stomach and Water to instantly cast your next fire mantra.

name: Shield Breaker
desc: Blunt damage now fully ignores the posture bonus from shields.

name: Unwavering Resolve
desc: Getting parried punishes your posture 33% less.

name: Jolting Current
desc: Your lightning attacks in water strike others near them with lightning.

name: Conductors Cable
desc: Applying Conductor rods on opponents steals some of their armor to you.

name: Hot Potato
desc: Gain a large boost of speed after throwing a bomb. Your bombs have a chance to detonate twice.

name: Pocket Bombs
desc: You have a chance to activate a bomb in your inventory when damaged.

name: Explosive Efficiency
desc: When crafting bombs, you craft double the amount. You have the chance to triple the amount.

name: Incendiary Formula
desc: Bombs will set your enemies on fire upon detonation, as well as launch with more force. Bombs will deal increased damage to burning enemies.

name: Sulphur Surprise
desc: Your cooldown for throwing bombs will be shortened after your first bomb damages on enemy.

name: Heavy Weapons Unbounded
desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Heavy Weapons attribute to its fullest.

name: Light Weapons Unbounded
desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Light Weapons attribute to its fullest.

name: Medium Weapons Unbounded
desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Medium Weapons attribute to its fullest.

name: Dark Receiver
desc: Shadow moves will also steal Ether from those you are Static Linked tethered to.

name: Pocket Sand
desc: [Fist] Feinting into an uppercut blinds and dazes your opponents briefly. Were even now, right? 30s cooldown

name: Gilded Path: Scrapsinger
desc: Flourishing an enemy consumes any rods they have and siphones their armor to you per rod.

name: Refine and Reuse
desc: Consuming rods with Scrapsinger reduces incoming PEN against you for 14 seconds. Each rod reduces PEN by 5% multiplicatively.

name: Songs Unforged
desc: Your weapon criticals will now activate Scrapsinger

name: Artisans Blade
desc: Activating Scrapsinger forges a metal blade behind you for every 2 rods you consume. Metal blades will fire at a target upon landing an ironsing or metal infused attack.

name: Dragons Song
desc: Landing a Mantra after an uppercut grants Ether. 2s CD.

name: Jumpstart
desc: Using Static Withdraw when not being carried applies Jumpstart, increasing your ability to scale walls, your speed and applies shock to all outgoing physical damage and damage taken. Grants a +10% damage multiplier.

name: Raging Static
desc: Your Jumpstart no longer gives you movement buffs, but your outgoing physical damage is increased up to 20%. The self damage to activate it is lowered. Your cooldown on Jumpstart is also lowered.

name: Shadowcast Unbounded
desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your shadowcast to its fullest.

name: Blossoming Darkness
desc: Ether drained during Shadow Roar increases the size of it.

name: Singularity
desc: Enemies will briefly hang in place when hit by a shadow move.

name: Fear
desc: Enemies that run from you after being hit by your shadows will hang in place briefly.

name: Lasting Sorrow
desc: Shadow lasts longer on your opponent.

name: Sightless Still
desc: The more a person is affected by your shadowcast the more you obscure their vision. Block breaking an opponent obscures their vision with darkness more potent than your Shadow mantra.

name: Shadowcaster
desc: Harnesss the power of Shadow in your mantra crafting.

name: Adept Shadowcaster
desc: You can now obtain 1-Star Leveled Shadowcaster Mantras.

name: Expert Shadowcaster
desc: You can now obtain 2-Star Leveled Shadowcaster Mantras.

name: Master Shadowcaster
desc: You can now obtain 3-Star Leveled Shadowcaster Mantras.

name: Knights Rally
desc: When using a shield, you ready your block more quickly after taking a hit.

name: Turtle Shell
desc: If your shield is on your back, take reduced backstab damage and negate Spine Cutter.

name: Emergency Repairs
desc: Your repairs are more efficient when the ship is on low health.

name: Spare Nails
desc: You always keep a couple spare. Your repairs are more efficient.

name: Unnecessary Theatrics
desc: Deliver a one-liner on uppercuts, flourishes, and critical attacks that charms your opponents briefly.

name: Snake Oil
desc: Okay, the amount youre charging people for your items is downright criminal. But Im just a talent description, I cant stop you.

name: Friends in High Places
desc: Your connections often let you off the hook when youre in trouble with the law. Nepotism sure does pay!

name: Haunted Path: Specter
desc: Build up spectral energy by preforming successful dodges and landing Wind mantras. Phantom winds from Haunted Gale no longer appear. You can no longer suffocate enemies.

name: Apparitions
desc: Instead of Haunted Gale Phantoms, each proc will now send apparations towards your enemy. The apparations will apply "Winded" where "Suffocation" would suffice. Apparations cannot be parried if you are in Phantom Step.

name: Phantom Step
desc: Press X to begin running at high speeds and your regular dashes turn into gale dashes. (Must have at least 10% Spectral Gauge)

name: Static Link
desc: Flourishing or uppercutting an enemy creates a static link between you and your enemy. Your lightning stuns enemies for 1.5x as long.

name: Link Conduction
desc: While you have active tethers your lightning mantras cost less ether.

name: Jumper Cables
desc: Getting knocked with an active tether allows you to steal health from tethered targets and not get knocked.

name: Static Allure
desc: Having two active tethers will cause the previous tethered enemy to get magnetized to your newest tethered enemy, also increases the duration of tethers by 15 seconds.

name: Static Ace
desc: Using Lightning Stream with an active tether targets your closest active link.

name: Storm Link
desc: While you have a Static Link on someone, your Wind mantras that hit them are imbued with flashes of Lightning.

name: Grasp on Reality
desc: Damage taken from insanity is reduced.

name: Unfazed
desc: You are more resilient to the side effects of going insane. You no longer Shiver and you Panic with less severity.

name: Voltaic Conductor
desc: Your Thundercall Mantras deal 20% chip damage against enemies with conductor rods.

name: Iron Gut
desc: You have resistance against being poisoned by foods.

name: Termite
desc: You can eat things most would consider inedible.

name: Herbivore
desc: You gain more nutrition from eating plants.

name: None Left Behind
desc: You can now shadestep to pick up knocked humanoids far away from you. 4s CD.

name: Pursuit
desc: If you land your Revenge, clear the cooldown immediately (25s cooldown).

name: Hard Read
desc: Hitting your opponent during a feint will cause them to be dazed.

name: Target Switch
desc: Parrying an opponent then hitting someone else makes your next mantra free.

name: Foolish Outburst
desc: Blocking or parrying a vent will absorb the Tempo cost of the vent. A Tactician steadies the course of battle.

name: Water off a Ducks Back
desc: Venting will shift any elemental status effects affecting you onto those hit by your vent. Will also remove potion splash statuses on vent.

name: Controlled Combustion
desc: Your Agitating Spark no longer spreads to your allies. All-Consuming Flame no longer applies against allies.

name: Artisan Chef
desc: The food you cook now becomes Artisan food, increasing its hunger and thirst gained by +25%.

name: Master Chef
desc: Buffs applied by food you cook now have their buffs amplified by +30%.

name: Flaming Flourish
desc: Set enemies on fire when you flourish or uppercut them.

name: Explosive Finish
desc: If an enemy is on fire when you flourish, blast them away with a fire blast.

name: Emperor Flame
desc: Absorb fire produced by you, once you reach 5 stacks your next attack will be an automatic Explosive Finish flourish.

name: Last Second Negotiations
desc: Most enemies will hesitate a moment longer before executing you.

name: Master Thief
desc: Gain more notes when mugging a player.

name: Pickpocket
desc: Gain the ability to pickpocket by pressing "N" on a downed person.

name: Cap Artist
desc: Pressing [R] while crouching allows you to fake being dead its cancelled when hit or when toggling [R] again.

name: Discharge
desc: [Light Weapons] On 5th successfull attack you will discharge static dealing lightning damage to those nearby.

name: Volt Kick
desc: After landing a lightning kick, press [F] to followup on your opponent with a less potent kick.

name: Jolt Cast
desc: Every 3 perfect casted lightning mantra builds a stack at 3 stacks your next lightning mantra is instant cast.

name: Rain of Static
desc: After successfully casting lightning impact, strike down countless thunder at those below. In return your Lightning Impact will require more time to cast.

name: Gathering Electricity [AGL]
desc: [Medium Weapons] Reaching 5 Static Blade charges automatically consumes the stacks and applies a lightning buff to your weapon. 60 second cooldown.

name: Gathering Electricity [STR]
desc: [Medium Weapons] Reaching 5 Static Blade charges automatically consumes the stacks and applies a lightning buff to your weapon. 60 second cooldown.

name: Static Blade
desc: [Medium Weapons] Hitting blocks or blocking or parrying hits will now generate an electric chage in your blade, granting a small speed buff. Charges can stack up to 5 times.

name: Overcharge
desc: Your next dash after activating Static Blade is enhanced by lightning.

name: Thundercall Unbounded
desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your thundercall to its fullest.

name: Static Flash Clone
desc: When using lightning clones you disappear leaving behind a static clone for a short duration.

name: Shocking Finish
desc: Following a flourish up with a lightning beam causes it to be casted instantly.

name: Stratoshock
desc: Your lightning deals more damage when in the rain.

name: Master Thundercaller
desc: You can now obtain 3-star Thundercaller mantras.

name: Thundercaller
desc: Grants you the ability to command Lightning as a Thundercaller.

name: Adept Thundercaller
desc: You can now obtain 1-star Thundercaller mantras.

name: Static Withdraw
desc: When being carried use this talent to shock your captor, forcing them to drop you. Bodies of knocked enemies will be charged with electricity which will stun people who attempt to carry them.

name: Expert Thundercaller
desc: You can now obtain 2-star Thundercaller mantras.

name: Discovery of Fire
desc: Flints and Flamecharm are for simpletons.

name: Narcissist
desc: Charming an already Charmed opponent Overcharms you briefly. Guess you really were that great.

name: Manipulator
desc: Deal 20% more critical attack damage to charmed enemies, but the effect is removed on impact.

name: Crippling Comeuppance
desc: Landing Revenge puts your opponents Mobility slot Mantras on CD for 15s. 30s CD.

name: Down Comes the Claw
desc: Landing a Critical while you have a speed boost prevents your opponent from being able to dodge twice in a row for 5s.

name: Maiming Claws
desc: Down Comes the Claw now disables your opponents posture regeneration for 3s on proc.

name: Wraith Path: Twisted Puppets
desc: Your Flamecharm mantras summon puppets of shadow and flame. Your flames are now black.

name: Moths to a Flame
desc: Your Twisted Puppets now home towards burning enemies.

name: Explosive Rage
desc: Causing explosions will make your puppets go into a frenzy - speeding up and dealing slightly more damage.

name: Burning Puppets
desc: Your puppets can now inflict burn and fire-based talents when they explode.

name: No Survivors
desc: Your allies and yourself execute faster while affected by Overcharm.

name: Surge Path: Unstable Capacitor
desc: Your lightning no longer applies Shock, instead applying Surge. At maximum statics of Surge, your opponents will Overload, sending arcs of lightning in every direction.

name: Catalytic Strike
desc: Posture breaking an enemy will Overload their Surge stacks.

name: Closed Circuit
desc: Surge Overloads that fail to arc to other opponents will deal additional damage to the Overloaded enemy.

name: Fried Circuits
desc: Overloading an enemy applies Sapped for 5s.

name: Human Battery
desc: When youre out of Ether, convert the Surge stacks of nearby enemies into Ether to pay the cost of your Mantras.

name: Battery Sapper
desc: If your Human Battery targets have Ether, it will drain their Ether to help pay for your Mantras. 10s Cd

name: Maestros Blade
desc: Inhaling a spell will cause the wind to be applied to your M1s.

name: Spinning Swordsman
desc: Running attacks do 15% extra damage when you have a speed boost.

name: Blade Dancer
desc: Landing an M1 removes your roll cooldown.

name: Bear Trap
desc: Landing a hit with your critical makes your opponent unable to jump for a duration. Also slows your opponent.

name: Action Surge
desc: Adrenaline Surge now increases your swing speed by 0.03s for its duration.

name: Propagandist
desc: Your Sing will now stir your allies into a frenzy, causing them to become Overcharmed for 15s, applying Charmed to enemies they hit with basic attacks.

name: Vow of Mastery
desc: The Vow of Mastery grants the Master the power to command their Subject. To initiate a vow, you must ask the other player if theyd like to make the vow.e.g."wanna make a vow of mastery?"

name: Command: Fight
desc: Command your servants to fight for their master, granting them enhanced stats for a duration.

name: Conditioned Swimmer
desc: You lose less hunger and thirst while swimming.

name: Finishing Touch
desc: [Daggers] Instantly execute enemies finished with the critical attack of your dagger.

name: Warriors Swing
desc: Reduces incoming damage if hit during Heavy swing hyper armor.

name: One Handed Training
desc: [Heavy Weapons] You can now wield heavy weapons one handed.

name: Brutal Momentum
desc: [Greatswords/Greathammers] Successfully dodging will give you hyperarmour on your next swing.

name: Successive Throw
desc: [Dagger] When you successfully flourish an enemy, you throw out a dagger afterwards.

name: Matador
desc: Deal +20% more damage to human enemies with hyperarmor.

name: Haunted Gale
desc: Every 3 hits landed by perfectly casted Galebreathe mantras will cause the target to be quickly struck by a phantom of wind.

name: Agility Unbounded
desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your agility to its fullest.
needs: QUEST: Talk to the Windrunner at Etris Wilds

name: Arc Module: Dash
desc: When Arc Suit is active, your dashes become Jet dashes allowing you to attack while dashing.

name: Arc Module: Eject
desc: When block broken with Arc Suit active, eject from the armor.

name: Arc Module: Guard
desc: Blocking with your Arc Suit active negates all backstabs and allows you to block attacks from behind.

name: Arc Module: Leap
desc: Holding Spacebar after double jumping propels you up for a short duration.

name: Arc Module: Null
desc: When your Arc suit is active, outgoing and incoming enchant effects are nullified.

name: All-Seeing Eye
desc: The mystic eye through which you now see the world can perceive the imperceptible. Invisible foes are highlighted.

name: String Trick
desc: Pulls together any two opponents youve attached Hidden Tendrils to.

name: Hidden Tendril
desc: Landing any physical mantra or critical places a hidden tendril on the opponent.

name: Absolute Radiance
desc: Dealing damage with Dawnwalker mantras briefly makes you immune to all elemental status effects for a short duration.

name: Protagonist Syndrome
desc: The grasp of shadow is meaningless in the face of your blinding light. Your Dawnwalker mantras are empowered after being hit by Shadowcast.

name: Luminous Flash
desc: After dealing a certain amount of damage while in Absolute Radiance, gain a chance to empower your strikes with pure light.

name: Hair Spray
desc: Apply your Hair Products.

name: Barbers Skillset
desc: What type of look are we going for today?

name: Hair Products
desc: Select Hair Products to apply to others with your Hair Spray.

name: Rush of Ancients
desc: Dashing at maximum sprint momentum makes you one with the wind itself.

name: Decisive Winds
desc: When damaged below 50% health, gain maximum sprint momentum temporarily, then this ability is put on cooldown.

name: Stratos Step
desc: While wallboosting, hold space and at the end of the wallboost, and you will be boosted further upwards.

name: Acceleration Points
desc: Striking an opponent in the back with mobility mantras or basic attacks now steals and grants additional momentum.

name: Jetstream Pursuit
desc: Upon a succesful flourish. teleport to the opponent when they stop moving. Receive a significant boost of momentum.

name: Entropy Link
desc: The world is broken, linked by fragile webs. Traverse the path by stating your destination amidst the flame.

name: Perpetual Distillery
desc: Your very body has become a distillery for your alchemy. Gain 3 Autobrew slots that will automatically produce 3 concoctions of your choice.

name: Biotic Salts
desc: Alter your brews to have reduced positive effects on your enemies and somewhat reduced negative effects on your allies when thrown. Does not count towards the ingredient limit.

name: Aromatic Salts
desc: Alter your brews to create lingering clouds of mist on shattering . Does not count towards the ingredient limit.

name: Antithetic Salts
desc: Alter your brews to invert their effects. Does not count towards the ingredient limit.

name: Ankle Cutter
desc: You can now do a ground slash while sliding, applying a temporary speed debuff and preventing jumping to enemies hit.

name: True Vantage
desc: Venting makes you invisible briefly while boosting your speed.

name: Merciless Blade
desc: You can now execute enemies much faster.

name: Mani Katti
desc: While you have Dread stacks, press CTRL + M2 to barrage your foes with a teleporting flurry of strikes. 12s cooldown

name: Lodestar
desc: Landing crits. flourishes, and uppercuts now Silences your enemy for 3s, disabling their ability to cast further mantras.

name: Dread Fighter
desc: Parrying, landing criticals, and flourishes now give you stacks of Dread. Each stack increases your damage multiplier up to 15% and mantra resistance up to 25%. You lose a stack when hit by a Mantra.

name: Vengeful Pursuit
desc: Your running M1s that whiff send out a mid-range crescent projectile that slows on hit. Tracks onto those with their backs turned to you. 8s CD.

name: Cheap Trick
desc: When hit below half health briefly disappear leaving behind an illusion clone to keep your opponent occupied. Briefly disappear after knocking an enemy.

name: Trained Fist
desc: You can now equip Cestus.
needs: Way of Navae or Legion Kata

name: Ethirons Gaze
desc: Your eyes have been opened to the wasteland. You can now see through the harsh fog of the storm of the Eternal Gale more clearly now.
needs: QUEST: Complete Firfires Spear of Nakti Quest

name: Legion Kata
desc: Gain the ability to use the Legions martial arts.
needs: QUEST: Talk to Amara in Lower Erisia with good Legion rep

name: Heretics Sutra
desc: A chant that steers you into the state of insanity for 20 seconds.
needs: QUEST: Go Tier 1 insanity; talk to Kasen in the Ethironal Shrine Sanctuary

name: Union Hook
desc: You can now make use of the Ignition Union hooks to ascend or descend.
needs: QUEST: Talk to Alpha in the Frontier Furnace after powering the generator.

name: Jus Karita
desc: Adopt the kick-based fighting style of the Justicars.

name: Thresher Scales
desc: You regenerate your armor at campfires.
needs: QUEST: Complete Jessamines King Thresher Quest

name: Chain of Perfection
desc: You gain stacks of "Perfection" on hitting mobs with close-ranged attacks. Perfection increases your damage towards mobs the more stack you have. All stacks are lost upon taking damage.

name: Pleetskys Will
desc: You gain significantly more ether from consuming elemental ingredients.
needs: QUEST: Complete Plooms Dying Ember Quest

name: Treefelling Blow
desc: You can collect lumber from the trees you fell with your fists. Its only natural.
needs: QUEST: Complete the Lumber Axe Quest in Etris

name: Excavator
desc: Chance to receive two sets of ore when mining. You mine things more quickly.
needs: QUEST: Turn in 5 Pure Ores to a Blacksmith

name: Harvester
desc: Chance to receive two sets of ingredients when harvesting. You fell trees in fewer strikes.
needs: QUEST: Complete the Potions Quest in Widows Cave

name: Family Recipe
desc: You can now craft bombs at a crafting bench.
needs: QUEST: Complete the Mineskipper Quest in Songseeker Wilds

name: Windwaker
desc: Call upon a gust of wind to propel your boat even faster.

name: Chime of Conflict
desc: Drift in and out of reality, challenging those hailing from distant lands. Grants you the ability to access the PvP Arena.

name: Critical Attack
desc: Landing a hit with your critical restores 30% of your posture.
needs: QUEST: Complete the Megalodaunt Quest in Towerstruck Lands

name: Engage
desc: Landing an M1 slightly restores some of your Ether.
needs: QUEST: Complete the Megalodaunt Quest in Towerstruck Lands

name: Mercy Kill
desc: When you flourish an enemy much weaker than you, you kill them instantly. Enemies that are greatly weaker than you die instantly from a single hit.
needs: QUEST: Uncap a Weapon or an Attunement stat

name: Aerial Assault
desc: Allows you to move quickly when you dodge mid-air.
needs: QUEST: Complete the Flame Gazer Quest in Pathfinders Respite

name: Centurions Resolve
desc: Your Legion Kata attacks now deal 10% more damage.

name: Chiefs Will
desc: Your Way of Navae fist style has 25% armor PEN

name: Crippling Darkness
desc: Your non-basic attacks have 20% PEN

name: Devastating Power
desc: Gain extra Ether for every mantra hit

name: Environmentalist
desc: Resist the effects of Weather effects

name: Ferrymans Curse
desc: Wearing this gives you a 20% chance to convert incoming elemental damage into Lightning damage

name: Fists of Navae
desc: You have a larger flourishing window

name: Force Your Way
desc: You can parry unparryable attacks from giant monsters, at the cost of 1% armor durability.

name: Hunters Reflexes
desc: Your dodge window is slightly increased (0.05s)

name: Intrepid Flame
desc: Flames wear off slower on you

name: Immortality
desc: Knock prevention for one hit whilst at 1% HP

name: Legendary
desc: Your weapon gives you ether back

name: Looter
desc: Get extra loot from items you turn in for rewards

name: Paired Soul
desc: Increases Katana damage by 25% and Shattered Katana, Alloyed Katana damage by 5%

name: Riot Breaker
desc: You receive 15% less posture damage and deal 10% more posture damage when under attack by 3 or more enemies

name: The Path
desc: Your Jus Karita attacks deal 10% more damage

name: Tidekeeper
desc: Losing 25% of your health within the span of 3 seconds grants a 15% damage buff, 20% defense buff and prevents from being knocked for 10 seconds

name: Unbreakable
desc: Significantly reduces the time spent stunned when you are blockbroken

name: Hip Shooter [MED]
desc: When wielded with a Medium/Heavy weapon, your side gun can now fire a bullet projectile. 5s CD

name: Hip Shooter [HVY]
desc: When wielded with a Medium/Heavy weapon, your side gun can now fire a bullet projectile. 5s CD

name: Piercing Blow
desc: Attacks that break an opponent's block ignore their Armor resistances.

name: Broken Ankles
desc: Blockbreaking an opponent puts their Mobility slot Mantras on CD for 12s. 30s CD
